## Analyzing the Gapminder Dataset

The Gapminder dataset has data from 1952-2007 for 142 countries on life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population.

This website examines the following 3 relationships:

- [Life expectancy and GDP per capita](life-gdp.qmd)

- [Life expectancy and population](life-population.qmd)

- [Changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for the country of Canada over time.](country.qmd)
